strategy: Apply a gradient boosting ensemble (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with targeted hyperparameter tuning using Bayesian optimization. Instead of relying on a single model, use cross-validation to fine-tune learning rate, tree depth, and subsampling ratios, while incorporating early stopping to prevent overfitting. This approach leverages ensemble learning to capture non-linear interactions in the data, which may improve R2 beyond the baseline by capturing complex patterns missed by simpler models.
